$$
\begin{aligned}
\theta&\sim\text{IG}(a_0,\,b_0)\\
X_{1:n}\mid\theta&\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}\text{N}(0,\,\theta).
\end{aligned}
$$



a. What is the posterior distribution for $\theta$ conditional on the data?
a. Derive the posterior mean and show that it is a convex combination of the prior mean and the MLE.
